comment: Good teacher with hard tests. The extra credit that he offered helped, but definately go to class cuz he has pop quizes, but as long as your paying attention, you'll do fine.

Dr. Li is such a sweet man! He offered 3 extra credit opportunities throughout the semester, but gave us an extra one to help our grades. Make sure to study for the tests; they are difficult, but not impossible. Also, attendance isn't mandatory, but he does give quizzes that reflect your grade! Overall, loved this class!
He is a WONDERFUL professor. He is willing to help. He offers extra credit. Test are hard if you don't study but not impossible. HIGHLY recommended

Great teacher and he really knows what he is talking about. He is also a great guy and is willing to help his students with problems. POLS is a hard class but go to every class and do every hw and you will get a B. The test are hard so you will have to do studying but there not impossible. I strongly recommend this teacher.
Easier than my high school pols class. you dont need book just go to class and listen and you get a B.

Go to class! He gives "pop" quizzes over the information covered in class that only help your grade. NO tests. Presentation and essays. Easy if you do the research. Very smart and helpful. Take him if you get the chance!

Nice teacher. Mixes lectures up with videos so you don't get too bored. No in class tests, just take home tests, they can be a little tricky, but with research its not too bad. GO TO CLASS...participation counts and there are pop quizzes(really he just asks about something he JUST told you, simple less than a sentence answers) Overall, good teacher
If you don't speak English, I recommend you find a new professor. He is really unfair and very judgemental. His tests are nearly impossible. AVOID AT ALL COSTS
kind, friendly, benevolent. we love him

Nice, kind and warm-hearted, also hard working, a perfect man in our department!! We all love you, dear Dr. Li!!:)^_^ This semester will end. We all hope you have a good winter vocation~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Nice guy. Good teacher. regular quizzes, and two papers, a bit else but also offers extra credit. You gotta work in the class but its not all that bad.
Easy teacher. Two policy papers, one country presentation and weekly guizzes.Class is dynamic and I learned a great deal.

GREAT professor! Very fair! Extra credit for every test. He will ask you how to make the test better and gives you everything you need. Great guy. You should take him! Made a class I hate interesting!

He is very hard to understand! If you really don't known all that much about Pol Sci to begin with then I recommend that you find another teacher. There's a lot of online quizes and they can be really hard. The classes are extremely boring!  Things are simple: quizes every week, a couple tests and notes every day.
Amazing teacher and mentor.  Very involved in his students careers and pursuits.
He is a terrific teacher. I had him for International Law & Organization and I really learned and enjoyed the class.
